steps.title: Ensure Safety
steps.description: Wear gloves if available. Make sure the area is safe for both rescuer and victim.

steps.title: Apply Direct Pressure
steps.description: Press a clean cloth, gauze, or bandage firmly on the wound.

steps.title: Elevate the Wounded Area (if possible)
steps.description: Raise the injured limb above heart level to reduce bleeding.

steps.title: Maintain Pressure Until Help Arrives
steps.description: Keep holding the cloth/bandage firmly. Do not remove it to check frequently; only add layers if soaked.

steps.title: Call for Medical Help
steps.description: Seek professional help if bleeding is heavy, spurting, or wonâ€™t stop.
